feed.title: Rising Embedded Mx
feed.subtitle: This is my world, where I can do what I think

entry.title: Openblt to STM Nucleo-64
entry.content:
Starting the Implementation of OpenBlt Project

Today, I am beginning work on implementing the OpenBlt project. In my previous job, I implemented this project for an STM34H53 platform. However, I will now port the project to a Nucleo 64 platform with an STM32F446 microcontroller.

I don’t believe that it’s an easy task, but as engineers, we thrive on challenges, and ‘impossible’ is what we do.

I don’t believe that it’s an easy task, but as engineers, we thrive on challenges, and ‘impossible’ is what we do.

entry.title: Welcome to the jungle!
entry.content:
This is my first post to this blog.

These posts will be the record of the time and troubles that I encounter when I work on a project. You can get an idea of the duration and complexity of the project before or until you do something related.
